title: Embrace Harvest Magic: Lughnasadh to Mabon Traditions

subtasks: Research Mabon traditions and symbolism
Collect natural materials for corn dollies
Learn techniques for crafting corn dollies
Participate in bread-making rituals, using seasonal grains
Decorate space with corn dollies and other symbols
Hold thanksgiving prayers or rituals during Mabon celebration
Gather stalks of corn or other suitable grain
Scour grain from the stalks
Dry the grain thoroughly
Braiding or weaving the grain into a doll shape
Add decorations or symbolic elements to the corn dolly

tasks.task: Bake bread as part of Mabon
subtasks: Select seasonal grains for the bread
Mill the grains into flour if necessary
Prepare dough using traditional methods
Let dough rise in a warm place
Shape the dough into loaves or other forms
Decorate the bread with grains or symbols
Bake the bread to the appropriate consistency
Cool and display the bread for the celebration
